item.title: Supplement: Streams
item.description: C++ Streams Supplement The Streams You Know std::cin and std::cout You are already familliar with the standard input and standard output streams (cin and cout, respectively). But, you may not have considered much beyond the simplest basics about how they work. This supplement will talk about how C++ supports a whole family of streams and stream-like objects, and how they work on a conceptual level that may help you when you run into confusion with stream-processing tasks.
